name: RAD BioMed Accelerator
overview:
RAD BioMed Accelerator is an endeavor uniquely positioned to tap the wealth of new life science technologies emerging from Israel’s academia, industry and private enterprises. The incubator provides physical infrastructure, seed capital, business development and a wide range of related services to help entrepreneurs establish companies that will join the flourishing Israeli biomedical industry. RAD BioMed Accelerator is owned by Mr. Yehuda Zisapel, President of the RAD Group.

RAD BioMed Accelerator is the natural interface between the world of biomedical research and the industry. It is the place in which the seed of an innovation is given the chance to germinate and grow to a level that enables it to develop as a viable, self-sustained company.

funding_round.source_description: AOPharma completed an investment round of $2 million led by Coronis Partners Care Medical Services and the Rad BioMed incubator
